verses.verse: Then <S%G5119><s%> was Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> led up <S%G321><s%> <S%G5681><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the wilderness <S%G2048><s%> to be tempted <S%G3985><s%> <S%G5683><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> the devil <S%G1228><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> when he had fasted <S%G3522><s%> <S%G5660><s%> forty <S%G5062><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> forty <S%G5062><s%> nights <S%G3571><s%>, he was afterward <S%G5305><s%> an hungred <S%G3983><s%> <S%G5656><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> when the tempter <S%G3985><s%> <S%G5723><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> <S%G5631><s%> to him <S%G846><s%>, he said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%>, If <S%G1487><s%> thou be <S%G1488><s%> <S%G5748><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>, command <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5628><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> stones <S%G3037><s%> be made <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5638><s%> bread <S%G740><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> he answered <S%G611><s%> <S%G5679><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%>, It is written <S%G1125><s%> <S%G5769><s%>, Man <S%G444><s%> shall <S%G2198><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> live <S%G2198><s%> <S%G5695><s%> by <S%G1909><s%> bread <S%G740><s%> alone <S%G3441><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> by <S%G1909><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> word <S%G4487><s%> that proceedeth <S%G1607><s%> <S%G5740><s%> out of <S%G1223><s%> the mouth <S%G4750><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>.

Then <S%G5119><s%> the devil <S%G1228><s%> taketh <S%G3880><s%> him <S%G846><s%> up <S%G3880><s%> <S%G5719><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the holy <S%G40><s%> city <S%G4172><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> setteth <S%G2476><s%> <S%G5719><s%> him <S%G846><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> a pinnacle <S%G4419><s%> of the temple <S%G2411><s%>,

And <S%G2532><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, If <S%G1487><s%> thou be <S%G1488><s%> <S%G5748><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>, cast <S%G906><s%> <S%G5628><s%> thyself <S%G4572><s%> down <S%G2736><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> it is written <S%G1125><s%> <S%G5769><s%>, <S%G3754><s%> He shall give <S%G1781><s%> his <S%G846><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> charge <S%G1781><s%> <S%G5699><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> thee <S%G4675><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> their hands <S%G5495><s%> they shall bear <S%G142><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%> up <S%G142><s%> <S%G5692><s%>, lest at any time <S%G3379><s%> thou dash <S%G4350><s%> <S%G5661><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> foot <S%G4228><s%> against <S%G4314><s%> a stone <S%G3037><s%>.

Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G5346><s%> <S%G5713><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, It is written <S%G1125><s%> <S%G5769><s%> again <S%G3825><s%>, Thou shalt <S%G1598><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> tempt <S%G1598><s%> <S%G5692><s%> the YY <S%G2962><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>.

Again <S%G3825><s%>, the devil <S%G1228><s%> taketh <S%G3880><s%> him <S%G846><s%> up <S%G3880><s%> <S%G5719><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> an exceeding <S%G3029><s%> high <S%G5308><s%> mountain <S%G3735><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> sheweth <S%G1166><s%> <S%G5719><s%> him <S%G846><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the kingdoms <S%G932><s%> of the world <S%G2889><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the glory <S%G1391><s%> of them <S%G846><s%>;

And <S%G2532><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, All <S%G3956><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> will I give <S%G1325><s%> <S%G5692><s%> thee <S%G4671><s%>, if <S%G1437><s%> thou wilt fall down <S%G4098><s%> <S%G5631><s%> and worship <S%G4352><s%> <S%G5661><s%> me <S%G3427><s%>.

Then <S%G5119><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Get thee hence <S%G5217><s%> <S%G5720><s%>, Satan <S%G4567><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> it is written <S%G1125><s%> <S%G5769><s%>, Thou shalt worship <S%G4352><s%> <S%G5692><s%> the YY <S%G2962><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> him <S%G846><s%> only <S%G3441><s%> shalt thou serve <S%G3000><s%> <S%G5692><s%>.

Then <S%G5119><s%> the devil <S%G1228><s%> leaveth <S%G863><s%> <S%G5719><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%>, behold <S%G2400><s%> <S%G5628><s%>, angels <S%G32><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> <S%G5656><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> ministered <S%G1247><s%> <S%G5707><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> when Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> had heard <S%G191><s%> <S%G5660><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> Yochanan <S%G2491><s%> was cast into prison <S%G3860><s%> <S%G5681><s%>, he departed <S%G402><s%> <S%G5656><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the Galil <S%G1056><s%>;

And <S%G2532><s%> leaving <S%G2641><s%> <S%G5631><s%> Natzeret <S%G3478><s%>, he came <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5631><s%> and dwelt <S%G2730><s%> <S%G5656><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> K'far-Nachum <S%G2584><s%>, which <S%G3588><s%> is upon the sea coast <S%G3864><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> the borders <S%G3725><s%> of Zabulon <S%G2194><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Nephthalim <S%G3508><s%>:

That <S%G2443><s%> it might be fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> <S%G5686><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> was spoken <S%G4483><s%> <S%G5685><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> Esaias <S%G2268><s%> the prophet <S%G4396><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5723><s%>,

The land <S%G1093><s%> of Zabulon <S%G2194><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the land <S%G1093><s%> of Nephthalim <S%G3508><s%>, by the way <S%G3598><s%> of the sea <S%G2281><s%>, beyond <S%G4008><s%> Yarden <S%G2446><s%>, the Galil <S%G1056><s%> of the goyim <S%G1484><s%>;

The people <S%G2992><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> sat <S%G2521><s%> <S%G5740><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> darkness <S%G4655><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5627><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> light <S%G5457><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> to them which <S%G3588><s%> sat <S%G2521><s%> <S%G5740><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the region <S%G5561><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> shadow <S%G4639><s%> of death <S%G2288><s%> light <S%G5457><s%> is sprung up <S%G393><s%> <S%G5656><s%> <S%G846><s%>.

From <S%G575><s%> that time <S%G5119><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> began <S%G756><s%> <S%G5662><s%> to preach <S%G2784><s%> <S%G5721><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> to say <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5721><s%>, Repent <S%G3340><s%> <S%G5720><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%> is at hand <S%G1448><s%> <S%G5758><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%>, walking <S%G4043><s%> <S%G5723><s%> by <S%G3844><s%> the sea <S%G2281><s%> of the Galil <S%G1056><s%>, saw <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5627><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%>, SHim`on <S%G4613><s%> called <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5746><s%> Kefa <S%G4074><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Andrew <S%G406><s%> his <S%G846><s%> brother <S%G80><s%>, casting <S%G906><s%> <S%G5723><s%> a net <S%G293><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the sea <S%G2281><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> they were <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> fishers <S%G231><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he saith <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Follow <S%G1205><s%> <S%G5773><s%> <S%G3694><s%> me <S%G3450><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> I will make <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5692><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> fishers <S%G231><s%> of men <S%G444><s%>.
And <S%G1161><s%> they straightway <S%G2112><s%> left <S%G863><s%> <S%G5631><s%> their nets <S%G1350><s%>, and followed <S%G190><s%> <S%G5656><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> going on <S%G4260><s%> <S%G5631><s%> from thence <S%G1564><s%>, he saw <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5627><s%> other <S%G243><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%>, Ya`akov <S%G2385><s%> the son of <S%G3588><s%> Zavdai <S%G2199><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Yochanan <S%G2491><s%> his <S%G846><s%> brother <S%G80><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> a ship <S%G4143><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> Zavdai <S%G2199><s%> their <S%G846><s%> father <S%G3962><s%>, mending <S%G2675><s%> <S%G5723><s%> their <S%G846><s%> nets <S%G1350><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> he called <S%G2564><s%> <S%G5656><s%> them <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> they immediately <S%G2112><s%> left <S%G863><s%> <S%G5631><s%> the ship <S%G4143><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> their <S%G846><s%> father <S%G3962><s%>, and followed <S%G190><s%> <S%G5656><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> went about <S%G4013><s%> <S%G5707><s%> all <S%G3650><s%> the Galil <S%G1056><s%>, teaching <S%G1321><s%> <S%G5723><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> their <S%G846><s%> synagogues <S%G4864><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> preaching <S%G2784><s%> <S%G5723><s%> the gospel <S%G2098><s%> of the kingdom <S%G932><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> healing <S%G2323><s%> <S%G5723><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> manner of sickness <S%G3554><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> manner of disease <S%G3119><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> the people <S%G2992><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> fame <S%G189><s%> went <S%G565><s%> <S%G5627><s%> throughout <S%G1519><s%> all <S%G3650><s%> Syria <S%G4947><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> they brought <S%G4374><s%> <S%G5656><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> sick <S%G2560><s%> people <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5723><s%> that were taken with <S%G4912><s%> <S%G5746><s%> divers <S%G4164><s%> diseases <S%G3554><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> torments <S%G931><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> those which were possessed with devils <S%G1139><s%> <S%G5740><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> those which were lunatick <S%G4583><s%> <S%G5740><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> those that had the palsy <S%G3885><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> he healed <S%G2323><s%> <S%G5656><s%> them <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> there followed <S%G190><s%> <S%G5656><s%> him <S%G846><s%> great <S%G4183><s%> multitudes of people <S%G3793><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the Galil <S%G1056><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> from Decapolis <S%G1179><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> from Yerushalayim <S%G2414><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> from Judaea <S%G2449><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> from beyond <S%G4008><s%> Yarden <S%G2446><s%>.
